Translations.Text: Sokrushayushchaya beda - voskreseniye, kotoroye nachnotsya pri pervom trubnom zvuke i zavershitsya Sudom nad lyud'mi
Kak ono udivitel'no, velichestvenno, strashno i uzhasno
Otkuda tebe znat', kakiye uzhasy i strakh ono navedot na lyudey
Eto sluchitsya v tot Den', kogda lyudi vo vremya ikh voskresheniya budut kak razletayushchiyesya povsyudu i sbivayushchiye drug druga napravo i nalevo slabyye unizhennyye motyl'ki
Kogda gory stanut kak tsvetnaya rasshchipannaya sherst', ikh chasti razdelyatsya i razveyutsya po vozdukhu vo vse storony
Togda tomu, ch'ya chasha dobrykh deyaniy opustitsya vniz, poskol'ku yego blagochestivyye deyaniya perevesyat durnyye
budet blazhenstvo i schastlivaya zhizn', kotoroy on budet dovolen
A tomu, ch'ya chasha dobrykh deyaniy na vesakh budet legche, poskol'ku yego zlodeyaniya bol'she, chem blagochestivyye deyaniya
A otkuda tebe znat', chto takoye adskaya propast'
Eto - pylayushchiy ogon', zhar kotorogo ne sravnitsya ni s kakim drugim ognom, skol'ko by yego ni razzhigali i skol'ko by topliva v nego ni brosali
